jcr:content.jcr:description: Find out more about Altra's response to the novel coronavirus epidemic, including a statement from Altra President Todd Dalhausser and information on how Altra is giving back to the community during this difficult time.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Community United

overlayImage.altText: Hayden Hawks discusses what to do when your race is cancelled
Corinna Coffin shares at home workouts
Tyler McCandless on getting outside with family

text_copy_copy.text:
LETTER FROM THE ALTRA PRESIDENT

 

TO OUR ALTRA FAMILY,

 

We know that these are stressful and uncertain times due to the rapidly evolving Coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak. Our hearts go out to those who are personally affected and the healthcare workers on the front lines everyday helping and taking care of people. 

 

We take comfort in the fact of knowing that we are all in this together, navigating the unknown day by day. You are all a part of the Altra Family and your health and well-being are our top priority. Facing this challenge together makes us even more committed to our community and to each other.

 

In an effort to do our part to slow the spread of the virus and protect our internal team and community, our employees will be working from home or remotely in accordance with the guidelines of government and health authorities. 

 

We encourage each other to practice social distancing and get outside (if you can according to your local restrictions) and move every day. And, if you are going to shop, think about your local retailers. These uncertain times can lead to economic distress for many of the small, local companies. We encourage you to think of them in your shopping needs.

 

Even though we may not be close in real life, we are still here for you every day. Connect with us on social media @altrarunning or email us at altra_customerservice@vfc.com. 

 

We still want to hear from you, and altrarunning.com remains up and running with product, news and content from our Altra Family.

  

We appreciate all of you,

 

TODD DALHAUSSER

ALTRA PRESIDENT AND THE GLOBAL ALTRA TEAM
